Text:
I believe this is the movie.

Panic Button - synopsis

	"Four young people win a trip of a lifetime to New York, courtesy of their favourite social-networking website - All2gethr.com. As they board the private jet, they are asked to relinquish their mobile phones and take part in the in-flight entertainment - a new online gaming experience.  

But this is no ordinary game. Trapped at 30,000 feet, they are forced to play for their lives and the lives of their loved ones by their invisible captor, who seems to all know their
most intimate secrets.    

With no escape and no one to trust, they are about to learn that putting your life on-line can have deadly offline consequencesĂ˘âŹÂŚ"
